articles.title: Singapore's weekly dengue cases expected to hit new peak, may surpass 2000 cases - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): The authorities have issued 59 stop-work orders to construction sites for repeated mosquito breeding offences this year, as Singapore braces itself for a record high in weekly dengue cases.
